pages.text: In addition to the status effects available in vanilla Minecraft, Kamen Rider Craft also includes its own set of effects to further enhance the Riders' powers. This section of the book provides a brief overview of all the new effects added, including examples on how you can get them.

pages.title: Boost
pages.text: With this effect, you will be able to boost yourself forward and off the ground by sneaking. Higher amplifiers act as a multiplier for the boost speed.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#rocket_switch)Rocket Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#jet_combat_gashat)Jet Combat Gashat$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#boost_raise_buckle)Boost Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Swift Swim
pages.text: This effect increases your swimming speed, like Dolphin's Grace but faster still. Higher amplifiers act as a multiplier for your swim speed.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#screw_switch)Screw Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Anti Poison
pages.text: This effect grants immunity to the Poison effect.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/items/wizard_rings#dolphi_ring)Dolphi Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Transform into $(l:revice/riders/jeanne)Kamen Rider Jeanne$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#zombie_raise_buckle)Zombie Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Slash
pages.text: With this effect, you will gain Strength equal to this effect's amplifier when using a sword.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:decade/arsenal/decade_slash_card)AttackRide Decade Slash$(/l) card$(li)Use the $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#musashi_ghost_eyecon)Musashi Ghost Eyecon$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#zakuzakuchips_gochizo)Zakuzakuchips Gochizo$(/l)

pages.title: Shot Boost
pages.text: This effect boosts the power of your projectile attacks.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:decade/arsenal/decade_blast_card)AttackRide Decade Blast$(/l) card$(li)Use the $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#chocodan_gochizo)Chocodan Gochizo$(/l)

pages.title: Punch
pages.text: With this effect, you will gain Strength equal to this effect's amplifier plus 3 when fighting with an empty hand. (Punch II gives Strength V, Punch III gives Strength VI, and so on)$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use any of Kuuga's $(l:kuuga/riders/kuuga#mighty)Mighty$(/l) or $(l:kuuga/riders/kuuga#ultimate)Ultimate$(/l) forms$(li)Use the $(l:w/items/gaia_memories#joker_memory)Joker Memory$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#punching_kong_progrisekey)Punching Kong Progrisekey$(/l)

pages.title: Flying
pages.text: This effect will allow you to fly as if you were in creative mode.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:skyrider/riders/skyrider)Skyrider$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_wing)Rider Ticket Sieg$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:revice/items/vistamps#ptera_vistamp)Ptera Vistamp$(/l)

pages.title: Pull
pages.text: This effect pulls nearby items toward you. Higher amplifiers increase the force of the pull.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#magnet_switch_n)N Magnet Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Push
pages.text: This effect pushes nearby mobs away from you. Higher amplifiers increase the force of the push and the radius within which mobs will be pushed.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#magnet_switch_s)S Magnet Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Note
pages.text: This effect causes you to emit a music note every tick.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#beat_switch)Beat Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Drill
pages.text: With this effect, you will be able to destroy any stone or netherrack blocks directly under you by sneaking.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:ooo/items/birth_cell_medals#birth_core_drill_arm)Birth Cell Medal (Drill Arm)$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#drill_switch)Drill Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#drill_raise_buckle)Drill Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Step
pages.text: This effect increases your stepping height by one half-block for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#giantfoot_switch)Giantfoot Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Gravity
pages.text: This effect increases the amount of gravity you experience, with higher amplifiers carrying a greater increase.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)ACtivate an $(l:misc/blocks/artificial_gravity_block)Artificial Gravity Block$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#gravity_ring)Gravity Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#gurucan_gochizo)Gurucan Gochizo$(/l)

pages.title: Low Gravity
pages.text: This effect decreases the amount of gravity you experience, with higher amplifiers carrying a greater decrease.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Travel to $(l:fourze/dimensions/the_moon)the Moon$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#parachute_switch)Parachute Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#newton_ghost_eyecon)Newton Ghost Eyecon$(/l)

pages.title: Long Arm
pages.text: This effect increases your block interaction range by one block for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#magichand_switch)Magichand Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#extend_ring)Extend Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:drive/items/shift_cars#hooking_wrecker)Hooking Wrecker$(/l) Shift Car

pages.title: Radar
pages.text: This effect applies the Glowing effect to nearby mobs and players.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#radar_switch)Radar Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Smoke
pages.text: This effect causes you to emit smoke particles.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#smoke_switch)Smoke Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Shrink
pages.text: This effect causes you to shrink down, with higher amplifiers making you shrink further.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#small_ring)Small Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#shrink_energy_item)Shrink Energy Item$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:revice/items/vistamps#kangaroo_vistamp)Kangaroo Vistamp$(/l) as $(l:revice/riders/vice#kangaroo)Kamen Rider Vice$(/l)

pages.title: Giant
pages.text: This effect causes you to grow in size, with higher amplifiers making you grow further.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:j/items/j_stone)J Stone$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#big_ring)Big Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#breaking_mammoth_progrisekey)Breaking Mammoth Progrisekey$(/l)

pages.title: Flatten
pages.text: This effect causes you to appear flat, like a 2D character.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:kuuga/riders/manga_kuuga)Manga Kuuga$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#shin_chan_switch)Shin-chan Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#flatten_energy_item)Flatten Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Stretch
pages.text: This effect causes you to stretch out and look tall.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#stretch_energy_item)Stretch Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Wide
pages.text: This effect causes you to stretch out and look wide.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#balloon_energy_item)Balloon Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Explode
pages.text: This effect causes you to explode once its duration runs out. Higher amplifiers increase the power of the explosion.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#end_energy_item)End Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Explosion
pages.text: This effect creates an explosion in the direction you are facing.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#explosion_ring)Explosion Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Bind
pages.text: This effect places cobwebs in the direction you are facing.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#bind_ring)Bind Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Fall
pages.text: This effect rapidly destroys the blocks beneath you, causing you to fall down.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#fall_ring)Fall Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Smell
pages.text: This effect gives Nausea and Slowness II to nearby mobs and players.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#smell_ring)Smell Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Merry Christmas
pages.text: This effect causes you to receive a $(l:misc/items/gift)Gift$(/l) every 4 minutes and 20 seconds.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Play Kamen Rider Craft from December 22nd through December 28th$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#merry_christmas_ring)Merry Christmas Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#christmas_energy_item)Christmas Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Fire Fist
pages.text: With this effect, you will ignite any entities you hit with an empty hand. Entities will ignite for one second for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:build/riders/kaiser#bikaiser)Bikaiser$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:revice/items/vistamps#komodo_dragon_vistamp)Komodo Dragon Vistamp$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#powered_builder_raise_buckle)Powered Builder Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Flame Slash
pages.text: With this effect, you will ignite any entities you hit with a sword. Entities will ignite for one second for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#hirihirichips_gochizo)Hirihirichips Gochizo$(/l)

pages.title: Explosive Punch
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with an empty hand to explode. Higher amplifiers increase the power of the explosion.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Wait for a future update

pages.title: Explosive Slash
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with a sword to explode. Higher amplifiers increase the power of the explosion.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Wait for a future update

pages.title: Flame Shot
pages.text: With this effect, you will ignite any entities you hit with an arrow. Entities will ignite for one second for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#fire_switch)Fire Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Explosive Shot
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with an arrow to explode. Higher amplifiers increase the power of the explosion.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#powered_builder_raise_buckle)Powered Builder Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Flame Body
pages.text: With this effect, any entities that hit you will ignite for one second for every level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/items/drago_timer)Drago Timer$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:gavv/items/gochizo#hirihirichips_gochizo)Hirihirichips Gochizo$(/l)

pages.title: Gatling
pages.text: This effect allows you to fire a stream of arrows by pressing the ability key.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#gatling_switch)Gatling Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:drive/items/shift_cars#midnightshadow)Midnight Shadow$(/l) Shift Car

pages.title: Cannon
pages.text: This effect allows you to shoot a small fireball every 6 seconds by pressing the ability key.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#launcher_switch)Launcher Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Warp
pages.text: This effect allows you to shoot an ender pearl every 6 seconds by pressing the ability key.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:drive/items/shift_cars#dimension_cab)Dimension Cab$(/l) Shift Car

pages.title: Stealth
pages.text: This effect allows you to turn invisible by pressing the ability key.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#stealth_switch)Stealth Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:build/items/fullbottles#ninja_full_bottle)Ninja Fullbottle$(/l)

pages.title: Fish!
pages.text: This effect causes you to drop a salmon by pressing the ability key, with a 9 second cooldown. Higher amplifiers increase the amount of salmon, and being on fire will cause the salmon to come out cooked.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#net_switch)Net Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#shark_raise_buckle)Shark Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Mirror
pages.text: With this effect, any entities that hit you will take the damage they dealt multiplied by this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#spike_switch)Spike Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#reflect_energy_item)Reflect Energy Item$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fantasy_raise_buckle)Fantasy Buckle$(/l)

pages.title: Return
pages.text: This effect teleports you back to your spawn point.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#teleport_ring)Teleport Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Sleep
pages.text: This effect skips the night, acting as a fast sleep method without setting your spawn.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#sleep_ring)Sleep Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#sleep_energy_item)Sleep Energy Item$(/l)

pages.title: Night
pages.text: This effect is the opposite of the Sleep effect, skipping the day instead.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#eclipse_ring)Eclipse Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Time
pages.text: This effect accelerates the day/night cycle by 10 ticks for each level of this effect's amplifier.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#time_ring)Time Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Blizzard
pages.text: This effect freezes all water beneath you, turning it into ice.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#freeze_switch)Freeze Switch$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#blizzard_ring)Blizzard Wizard Ring$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:drive/items/shift_cars#road_winter)Road Winter$(/l) Shift Car

pages.title: Thunder
pages.text: This effect calls down a lightning bolt in the direction you are facing.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#thunder_ring)Thunder Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Thunder Punch
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with an empty hand to be struck by lightning.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#x_assemble_ride_chemy_card)X Assemble Ride Chemy Card$(/l)

pages.title: Thunder Slash
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with a sword to be struck by lightning.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#elek_switch)Elek Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Thunder Shot
pages.text: With this effect, you will cause any entities you hit with an arrow to be struck by lightning.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Wait for a future update

pages.title: Form Timeout
pages.text: Forms that have this effect will revert to a base form after the duration runs out.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use Kamen Rider Faiz's $(l:faiz/riders/faiz#axel)Axel$(/l) form

pages.title: Form Lock
pages.text: This effect locks you into your current form. You can still transform into a different Rider, but you will be unable to change their form for the duration of this effect.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Wait for a future update

pages.title: Greeed
pages.text: This effect causes $(l:ooo/mobs/yummy_mob)Yummies$(/l) to spawn around you. Higher amplifiers increase the rate at which they spawn.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Carry a stack of $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medals$(/l) in your inventory

pages.title: Cosmic Energy
pages.text: This effect boosts the strength of $(l:fourze/riders/fourze)Kamen Rider Fourze$(/l)'s Astroswitches by one.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#cosmic_switch)Cosmic Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Happy Mode
pages.text: This effect makes the game a bit more YouTube-friendly. Mobs now spawn confetti when hit and go to sleep once they've had enough fun.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:den_o/riders/shin_o)Kamen Rider Shin-O$(/l)$(li)Transform into $(l:den_o/riders/dan_o)Kamen Rider Dan-O$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#shin_chan_switch)Shin-chan Switch$(/l)

pages.title: Flower
pages.text: This effect causes you to drop a poppy.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#flower_ring)Flower Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Connect
pages.text: This effect opens your Ender Chest for you.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#connect_ring)Connect Wizard Ring$(/l)

pages.title: Ghost
pages.text: With this effect, you will be able to float upward slowly by sneaking. You will also never feel hungry, as ghosts can't eat dinner.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:ghost/riders/ghost)Kamen Rider Ghost$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:build/items/fullbottles#obake_full_bottle)Obake Fullbottle$(/l)$(li)Use the $(l:saber/items/wonder_ride_books#ghost_ijinroku_wonder_ride_book)Ghost Ijinroku Wonder Ride Book$(/l)

pages.title: Bugster Virus
pages.text: This effect causes $(l:ex_aid/mobs/bugstervirus_mob)Bugsters$(/l) to spawn around you. Higher amplifiers increase the rate at which they spawn. If you have the Hazard Level effect as well, $(l:ex_aid/mobs/nebula_bugstervirus_mob)Nebula Bugsters$(/l) will spawn instead.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use a $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#proto_mighty_action_x_gashat)Proto Gashat$(/l)

pages.title: Reset
pages.text: This effect resets you to your base form.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Fight $(l:ex_aid/mobs/cronus)Gamedeus Cronus$(/l)

pages.title: Save
pages.text: This effect protects you from negative status effects, include the Explode and Reset effects.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Use the $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#hyper_muteki_gashat)Hyper Muteki Gashat$(/l)

pages.title: Pause
pages.text: This effect pauses your movement, causing you to freeze in place.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Fight $(l:ex_aid/mobs/cronus)Kamen Rider Cronus$(/l)

pages.title: Portal Cooldown
pages.text: This effect prevents you from using a portal.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Walk through a $(l:misc/blocks/helheim_crack)Helheim Crack$(/l)

pages.title: Rider Dokushu!
pages.text: This effect poisons any mob you hit with an empty hand.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:drive/riders/brain)Kamen Rider Brain$(/l)

pages.title: Hazard Level
pages.text: This effect causes the Bugster Virus effect to spawn $(l:ex_aid/mobs/nebula_bugstervirus_mob)Nebula Bugsters$(/l) instead of normal $(l:ex_aid/mobs/bugstervirus_mob)Bugsters$(/l).$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Consume a $(l:build/items/nebula_gas_sample)Nebula Gas Sample$(/l)

pages.title: Mirror Noises
pages.text: This effect causes a $(l:ryuki/mobs/mirror_rider)Mirror Rider$(/l) to spawn once the effect has worn off.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Break a glass block with a $(l:ryuki/arsenal/advent_decks#advent_deck_blank)Blank Advent Deck$(/l)  in your hand

pages.title: Wonder
pages.text: This effect allows you to alter your size by pressing the ability key. You can grow while standing and shrink while sneaking.$(br2)Examples for how to get this effect:$(li)Transform into $(l:zeztz/riders/zeztz#wonder)Kamen Rider Zeztz Paradigm Wonder$(/l)
